```{r}
AE <- experience %>%
```

```{r}
test <- merge(traindata, person, by = c("client", "participant"))
```
```{r}
AE <- test %>%
  group_by(client,participant, year, month) %>%
  summarise(Actual = sum(death)* FaceAmt, Expect = sum(qx)*FaceAmt)%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  group_by(client, year, month)%>%
  summarise(Actual = sum(Actual), Expect = sum(Expect))%>%
  mutate(AE= Actual/Expect)
```
